questions.clue: This type of sushi, commonly found in Japan, features raw fish atop a small bed of rice.
This sushi roll, inspired by American tastes, often includes avocado and imitation crab.
This country is known for its 'kimbap', which resembles sushi but uses cooked ingredients and sesame oil-flavored rice.
In the anime 'One Piece', this Straw Hat Pirate is known for his love of sushi, particularly octopus sushi.
This type of sushi, often mentioned in Japanese manga, is a fermented delicacy made from fish, rice, and salt, traditionally from the Lake Biwa region.
This 1988 film, based on a manga by Katsuhiro Otomo, is set in a dystopian 2019 Tokyo.
Featuring a futuristic, cyberpunk world, this 1995 anime film follows Major Motoko Kusanagi.
This anime series, first airing in 1998, follows a group of bounty hunters traveling in space.
Created by Yoshiyuki Tomino, this 1979 series introduced the world to giant humanoid robots called mobile suits.
Originally a manga by Osamu Tezuka, this 1963 anime series is about a robot boy with incredible powers.
This manga series follows the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew as they seek the One Piece.
Set in a world of titans, this manga features characters like Eren Yeager and is known for its intense battles.
This manga by Masashi Kishimoto follows a young ninja who dreams of becoming the leader of his village.
This manga involves a teenager who finds a notebook that allows him to kill anyone by writing their name in it.
In this manga, a young alchemist loses his arm and leg in a failed experiment to resurrect his mother.
This 2001 animated film by Studio Ghibli, directed by Hayao Miyazaki, features a young girl named Chihiro in a mysterious world.
Named after a Japanese dish, this 2013 documentary follows Jiro Ono, a renowned sushi chef in Tokyo.
This 1988 Studio Ghibli film tells the story of two girls and their interactions with forest spirits, including a large furry creature.
This anime film, directed by Makoto Shinkai, involves a body-swapping romance between a boy and a girl, released in 2016.
In this 1988 anime film, a cyberpunk dystopian Tokyo is the setting for a story about a biker gang and a psychic named Tetsuo.
This British monarch, known for her long reign, was the grandmother of Europe and shares her name with a famous Tokyo sushi restaurant.
Dubbed the 'Mother of Modern Nursing,' she was known for her work during the Crimean War and inspired many, just like a beloved anime character might.
This French heroine and Catholic saint led the French army to victory over the English at Orléans and inspired countless manga stories.
A key figure in the civil rights movement, she refused to give up her bus seat in Montgomery, Alabama, in 1955, influencing many stories in anime about standing up for justice.
This Polish-French physicist and chemist was the first woman to win a Nobel Prize and is known for her research on radioactivity, a subject often explored in science fiction manga.

final.clue: This word, often associated with sushi, also refers to a type of manga that focuses on the preparation and enjoyment of food.
